hanzi-su-wiki:
猛

Значения

Жестокий, яростный; злой

Мнемоника

Купать первенца в чаше 皿, спаивая воду собакам 犭, чтобы те хорошо охраняли бы ребенка 子.

koohiiStory1: The fierce WILD DOG attacked the CHILD who came near his feeding DISH.
koohiiStory2: If you want to make your wild dogs fierce, feed them a child. Children are the holy grail of dogfood you know...
jp_example_words: 猛烈(もうれつ): violent, vehement, rage
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: An animal eats a child from a plate in a very fierce manner. This is a fierce animal, so it makes sense that it would eat the child in a fierce style.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: See the fierce animal fiercely eating the child from the plate. It’s very gruesome. See blood and body parts flying everywhere as the animal devours the child.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The reason this fierce animal is eating the child from the plate is because the child forgot to mow (もう) the animal’s lawn. The fierce animal had hired the child to mow his lawn today, and when the child forgot to do it, the fierce animal hunted the child down and ate him.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: That child really shouldn’t have forgotten to mow the lawn. Imagine you are the child, being eaten by the fierce animal and wishing that you would have just mowed the lawn like you said you would.
Ru_Meaning: fierce, rave, rush, become furious, wildness, strength

Kanshudo_mnemonic: in the beginning (孟) the dog (犭) is fierce
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The fierce WILD DOG attacked the CHILD who came near his feeding DISH.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " dog " and " Meng ", it means fierceness. "The Second Year of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xuan Gong": "Abandoned people use dogs, what is it for fierce!"

" Meng " can mean strong. "Shuowen": "A good dog. From the dog, Meng Sheng." Duan Yucai's note: "Under the guise of Fanjian's 偁." "Guangya‧ Shigu II": "Meng, Jianye." Tan Dufu. Chaoxian Presents Taiqing Palace Fu>: "Zhang Mengma, there is a Tengqiu."

" Meng " also means severe. "The Twenty Years of Zuo Zhuan-Zhao Gong": "Legacy is to aid fierceness, fierce to aid lenient, politics is peaceful."

" Meng " can also mean bravery. Han Meicheng "Seven Hairs": "Yiwu Kong is fierce, with a thin naked body; white blades and halberds staggered."

" Meng " can also mean fierce. The Southern Dynasty Liang Wang Sengru "Essay on the Early Night": "The long drop of Xia River, the fierce scorching of Qiuyuan."

" Meng " can also be used as an adverb to mean sudden. Song Mei Yaochen (Su Shaodai Wenyu returned to Uncle Yong for buying lotus roots): "The cold room is violently loud, and the wet windows are broken through."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " dog " and " meng ", it means fierceness.
humanum_full_description:
從「犬」，「孟」聲，表示凶猛。《左傳‧宣公二年》：「棄人用犬，雖猛何為！」

　　「猛」可表示健壯。《說文》：「健犬也。从犬，孟聲。」 段玉裁注：「假借為凡健之偁。」《廣雅‧釋詁二》：「猛，健也。」唐杜甫〈朝獻太清宮賦〉：「張猛馬，出騰虬。」

　　「猛」還表示嚴厲。《左傳‧昭公二十年》：「寬以濟猛，猛以濟寬，政是以和。」

　　「猛」亦可表示勇猛。漢枚乘〈七發〉：「毅武孔猛，袒裼身薄；白刃磑磑，矛戟交錯。」

　　「猛」還可表示猛烈。南朝梁王僧孺〈初夜文〉：「壅夏河之長瀉，撲秋原之猛燎。」

　　「猛」還可用作副詞，表示突然。宋梅堯臣〈宿邵埭聞雨因買藕芡人回呈永叔〉：「寒屋猛添響，濕窗愁打穿。」

猛烈(もうれつ): violent, vehement, rage

從「 犬 」，「 孟 」聲，表示凶猛。《左傳‧宣公二年》：「棄人用犬，雖猛何為！」 「 猛 」可表示健壯。《說文》：「健犬也。从犬，孟聲。」 段玉裁注：「假借為凡健之偁。」《廣雅‧釋詁二》：「猛，健也。」唐杜甫〈朝獻太清宮賦〉：「張猛馬，出騰虬。」 「 猛 」還表示嚴厲。《左傳‧昭公二十年》：「寬以濟猛，猛以濟寬，政是以和。」 「 猛 」亦可表示勇猛。漢枚乘〈七發〉：「毅武孔猛，袒裼身薄；白刃磑磑，矛戟交錯。」 「 猛 」還可表示猛烈。南朝梁王僧孺〈初夜文〉：「壅夏河之長瀉，撲秋原之猛燎。」 「 猛 」還可用作副詞，表示突然。宋梅堯臣〈宿邵埭聞雨因買藕芡人回呈永叔〉：「寒屋猛添響，濕窗愁打穿。」
From the sound of " dog" and " Meng", it means fierceness. "The Second Year of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xuan Gong": "Abandoned people use dogs, what is it for fierce!" " Meng" can mean strong. "Shuowen": "A good dog. From the dog, Meng Sheng." Duan Yucai's note: "Under the guise of Fanjian's 偁." "Guangya‧ Shigu II": "Meng, Jianye." Tan Dufu. Chaoxian Presents Taiqing Palace Fu>: "Zhang Mengma, there is a Tengqiu." " Meng" also means severe. "The Twenty Years of Zuo Zhuan-Zhao Gong": "Legacy is to aid fierceness, fierce to aid lenient, politics is peaceful." " Meng" can also mean bravery. Han Meicheng "Seven Hairs": "Yiwu Kong is fierce, with a thin naked body; white blades and halberds staggered." " Meng" can also mean fierce. The Southern Dynasty Liang Wang Sengru "Essay on the Early Night": "The long drop of Xia River, the fierce scorching of Qiuyuan." " Meng" can also be used as an adverb to mean sudden. Song Mei Yaochen (Su Shaodai Wenyu returned to Uncle Yong for buying lotus roots): "The cold room is violently loud, and the wet windows are broken through."

猛字的基本解释

猛
měng
气势大，力量大：猛将。猛士。猛烈。勇猛。
忽然，突然：猛然。猛省（x媙g ）（亦作“猛醒”）。猛可（突然，陡然）。猛不防。
严厉：宽以济猛。
凶暴：苛政猛于虎。猛禽。猛兽。猛戾。猛悍。
古哺乳动物，长毛的象：猛犸。

猛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［měng］
［《廣韻》莫杏切，上梗，明。］
(1)健犬。
(2)残暴；凶猛。
(3)指凶猛的人或兽类。
(4)勇猛；威猛。
(5)严厉。
(6)猛烈。气势盛；力量大。
(7)指迅猛。
(8)坚强；坚硬；坚定。
(9)用力貌；尽情貌。
(10)犹厉害。
(11)别，不要。
(12)突然；忽然。
(13)姓。春秋宋有猛獲。见《左传·庄公十二年》。

猛字的英文翻译

◎ 猛
suddenly, with a rush

猛字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　猛； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页713第26
〔古文〕?【唐韻】莫杏切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】母梗切，?音蜢。【說文】健犬也。　又?氏，獸名。【司馬相如·上林賦】鋋猛氏。【註】郭璞曰：今蜀中有獸，狀如熊而毛淺，有光澤，名猛氏。　又【玉篇】健也。【廣韻】勇猛。【禮·郊特牲】虎豹之皮，示服猛也。　又【玉篇】嚴也。【左傳·昭二十年】惟有德者能以寬服民，其次莫如猛。　又【玉篇】惡也，害也。【禮·檀弓】苛政猛于虎。　又虎猛縣，屬西河郡。猛陵縣，屬蒼梧郡。皆見【前漢·地理志】。　又山名。【淮南子·地形訓】汝出猛山。　又姓。【廣韻】左傳晉大夫猛獲之後。

猛字的起名意思

：指严厉、突然、气势大、力量大、快。

fierce
Basic explanation of words
fierce
měng
Great momentum, great strength: fierce general. Warrior. violent. Brave.
Suddenly, suddenly: suddenly. Meng province (x媙g) (also known as "Meng Xing"). Mengke (suddenly, suddenly). Suddenly.
Severe: lenient to aid fierce.
Brutality: Harshness is stronger than tigers. Raptor. Beast. Fierce. Fierce.
Ancient mammals, hairy elephants: mammoths.
fierce
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [měng]
["Guangyun" Mo Xingqie, top stem, Ming. ]
(1) Healthy dogs.
(2) Brutal; ferocious.
(3) Refers to ferocious people or beasts.
(4) Bravery; mighty.
(5) Stern.
(6) Violent. Vigorous; powerful.
(7) Refers to swiftness.
(8) Strong; hard; firm.
(9) Look hard; enjoy look.
(10) It's amazing.
(11) Don't, don't.
(12) Suddenly; suddenly.
(13) Last name. Spring, Autumn and Song have made a big hit. See "Zuo Zhuan · Twelve Years of Zhuang Gong".
fierce

◎ fierce
suddenly, with a rush
fierce
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　 Meng; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 713 26
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Mo Xingqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] The mother stem is cut, and the sound is a stalk. [Said the text] The dog is also healthy.　 Another? Clan, the name of the beast. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Clan Mengshi. [Note] Guo Pu said: In today's Shu, there are beasts, which resemble bears and have light hairs, shiny, and named Mengshi.　[Jade Chapter] Jian Ye. [Guang Yun] Brave. [Li·jiao Special Sacrifice] The skin of tiger and leopard, showing fierce service.　[Jade Chapter] Yan Ye. [Zuo Zhuan·20 Years of Zhao] Only those who are virtuous can subdue the people with lenient, followed by fierceness.　[Jade Chapter] Evil is also harmful. [Li·Tan Gong] Harshness is stronger than tigers.　You Humeng County, belongs to Xihe County. Mengling County belongs to Cangwu County. See [Former Han Geography].　Also the name of the mountain. [Huainanzi·Training of Terrain] Ru came out of Mengshan.　Another last name. [Guang Yun] Zuo Chuan after Dr. Jin's violent victory.

Name meaning
: Refers to severe, sudden, powerful, powerful, and quick.
měng
I прил. /наречие
1) свирепый, лютый; хищный, кровожадный
猛犬 свирепый пёс
猛鸟 хищная птица
猛于虎 кровожаднее тигра
2) яростный, бурный; жестокий, свирепый
猛打 бить жестоко
猛战 жестокий бой
猛长 бурно расти
3) смелый, храбрый, напористый, сильнодействующий, сильный
猛毒 сильный (сильнодействующий) яд
4) быстрый, резкий; быстро, резко; неожиданно, вдруг
猛咬 внезапно укусить
5) суровый, строгий (в обхождении)
猛以济宽 строгим обращением умерять своё великодушие (оправителе)
II гл.
ошарашивать, ошеломлять
把我猛住了я был ошеломлён
III собств.
Мэн (имя)
Radicals: 犭, 子, 皿  (animal, child, plate)
Meaning Mnemonic
An animal eats a child from a plate in a very fierce manner. This is a fierce animal, so it makes sense that it would eat the child in a fierce style.
See the fierce animal fiercely eating the child from the plate. It’s very gruesome. See blood and body parts flying everywhere as the animal devours the child.
Reading Mnemonic
The reason this fierce animal is eating the child from the plate is because the child forgot to mow (もう) the animal’s lawn. The fierce animal had hired the child to mow his lawn today, and when the child forgot to do it, the fierce animal hunted the child down and ate him.
That child really shouldn’t have forgotten to mow the lawn. Imagine you are the child, being eaten by the fierce animal and wishing that you would have just mowed the lawn like you said you would.

子 (ребёнок), 犯 (преступник), 皿 (тарелка)
